CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 2008 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 2008 Code, as supplemented or updated through June 13, 2011, that are included herein. Sections of the 2008 Code, as supplemented, not listed have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
2008 Code
Section Section

this Code
